Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback {RTP}.
Paytable.overallChances: There is a 1 in {odds} overall chance of winning a prize on each play.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game. 0

landscape.text1: Match Your Numbers to Winning Numbers and win the corresponding prize.0
landscape.text2: {instantWin} Reveal a Blue Gem symbol to instantly win the corresponding prize.0
landscape.text3: {instantWin10X} Reveal a 2x symbol to instantly win double the prize amount0.

landscape.text1: {wheel} Reveal a Wheel Bonus symbol to trigger the Wheel Bonus.0
landscape.text2: WHEEL BONUS – Press Spin to spin the wheel. When the wheel stops, the pointer indicates the prize won on the inner wheel, and the prize multiplier on the outer wheel.0

portrait.text1:
{wheel} Reveal a Wheel Bonus symbol to trigger
the Wheel Bonus.0
portrait.text2:
WHEEL BONUS – Press Spin to spin the wheel.
When the wheel stops, the pointer indicates the prize won on the inner wheel,
and the prize multiplier on the outer wheel.0

landscape.text1: {collect} Reveal a Prize Bonus symbol to trigger the Prize Bonus.0
landscape.text2:
PRIZE BONUS - Press Diamonds to reveal prizes. Prizes accumulate in the Total Bonus Win meter.
Reveal a Gold Star to end the bonus and collect the prizes.0
